name: MCSE Private Cloud - 70-247
subtitle: Configuring and Deploying a Private Cloud
description: This course describes how to configure and deploy a cloud with Microsoft System Center 2012 R2. It focuses on how to manage and administer a cloud environment, and it describes how you can configure and deploy the  cloud fabric. This course will help you to acquire the skills required to deploy and configure System Center 2012 R2 for Cloud and Datacenter hosting and management. In addition, how to use System Center Virtual Machine Manager, Service Manager, and Operations Manager to coordinate fabric monitoring is covered. If you are new to operating a private cloud, or have been managing one and want to update your skills, then this course will show you how.
descriptionMD: This course describes how to configure and deploy a cloud with Microsoft System Center 2012 R2. It focuses on how to manage and administer a cloud environment, and it describes how you can configure and deploy the  cloud fabric. This course will help you to acquire the skills required to deploy and configure System Center 2012 R2 for Cloud and Datacenter hosting and management. In addition, how to use System Center Virtual Machine Manager, Service Manager, and Operations Manager to coordinate fabric monitoring is covered. If you are new to operating a private cloud, or have been managing one and want to update your skills, then this course will show you how.

episodes.title: Overview
episodes.description: This course describes how to configure and deploy a cloud with Microsoft System Center 2012 R2. It focuses on how to manage and administer a cloud environment, and it describes how you can configure and deploy the cloud fabric. This course will help you to acquire the skills required to deploy and configure System Center 2012 R2 for Cloud and Datacenter hosting and management. In addition, how to use System Center Virtual Machine Manager, Service Manager, and Operations Manager to coordinate fabric monitoring is covered. If you are new to operating a private cloud, or have been managing one and want to update your skills, then this course will show you how.

episodes.title: Planning for the Cloud
episodes.description: In this episode, Cherokee and Adam cover terminology to set the stage for future shows and discussions. Adam stresses the importance of understanding the difference between Public and Private Cloud models. They discuss what types of services and deployments organizations may choose to use. Lastly, Adam explained the Fab 4, RAM, CPU, Network and Storage.

episodes.title: Planning for the Cloud Part 2
episodes.description: In this show, Cherokee and Adam reiterate important terminology (see show files for definitions). They also explain the difference between bare metal (Type 1 hypervisors) and type 2 hypervisors. Adam also offers solutions to install Hyper-V via the GUI and via PowerShell. Tune in to learn more commandlets and PowerShell syntax .

episodes.title: Planning for the Cloud Part 3
episodes.description: In this episode, watch Cherokee and Adam explain System Center Virtual Machine Manager. Adam demonstrates an installation and explains several supporting options. They also explain using VMM in a cluster environment.

episodes.title: Private Cloud with SCVMM
episodes.description: In this episode, Adam and Cherokee  begin this episode by showing and explaining generic Virtual Machine Manager architecture fundamentals. This episode, however is anything but generic. Adam goes in depth as he explains several topics such as VMM Libraries, tenants, resources managed by the VMM and Fabric Features.

episodes.title: Private Cloud with SCVMM Part 2
episodes.description: In this episode, Cherokee and Adam continue to explain SCVMM components. First, they theorize on several concepts such as storage, Software Defined Networking (SDN), network virtualization architecture breakdown, customer and provider addresses. Adam then proceeds to demonstrate the previously discussed concepts like creating custom address pools for logical networks.

episodes.title: Private Cloud with SCVMM Part 3
episodes.description: In this episode, Cherokee and Adam begin by reviewing previously covered topics. They then dive back into Virtual Machine Manager. In addition to several ways to define and publish the virtual network, they also cover Network Virtualization using Generic Routing Protocol. Adam also demonstrates several concepts such as creating VIP templates for Network Load balancing and more!

episodes.title: Private Cloud with SCVMM Part 4
episodes.description: In this show, Cherokee and Adam begin discussing Software Defined Networking (SDN). They also cover several different concepts that have been explained thus far pertaining to SCVMM. Adam also explains different user roles as well as demonstrates how to delegate those roles. Tune in for more!

episodes.title: Private Cloud with SCVMM Part 5
episodes.description: In this show, Cherokee and Adam explain host groups. They discuss what they are and why they matter. Adam walks through the steps explaining important details one would need to know, such as the way child objects inherent properties. Tune in now to see demos on creating a host groups, adding trusted Hyper-V hosts and host clusters in VMM and more!

episodes.title: Extend and Maintain Cloud Infrastructure
episodes.description: In this show, Cherokee and Adam give a high level overview of Pre-Execution Environment (PXE) and Update Server roles. They discuss pre-staging concepts followed by a demonstration on how to provision and customize hard drives that would be used with a PXE configuration.

episodes.title: Extend and Maintain Cloud Infrastructure Part 2
episodes.description: In this show, Cherokee and Adam integrate the WSUS server with SCVMM. Adam expresses how it is essential to manage WSUS via SCVMM after the initial configuration. He continues to navigate thru SCVMM to show where job information is stored as well as demonstrating other capabilities such as creating a baseline and running compliance checks.

episodes.title: Extend and Maintain Cloud Infrastructure Part 3
episodes.description: In this show, Cherokee and Adam integrate the WSUS server with SCVMM. Adam expresses how it is essential to manage WSUS via SCVMM after the initial configuration. He continues to navigate thru SCVMM to show where job information is stored as well as demonstrating other capabilities such as creating a baseline and running compliance checks.

episodes.title: Server App-V 70247
episodes.description: In this show, Adam demonstrates a step by step tutorial on how to use Server App-V.

episodes.title: Service and VM Templates
episodes.description: In this show, Adam demonstrates a step by step tutorial on how to create, import,  and export Service Templates. You will also get a chance to see how to modify the properties of a virtual machine template.

episodes.title: Application Profiles
episodes.description: In this show, Adam demonstrates a step by step tutorial on how to create and use Application Profiles.

episodes.title: Configuring Application Delivery
episodes.description: In this episode Adam and Cherokee explain how one may deploy applications. Specifically, they begin looking at Web Deploy and the three methods in which one can create a web deployment package, IIS Manager, Visual Studio and Web Deploy Command line.  Adam also explains key Server App-V terms one would need to know. Next, they walk thru the process showing how the sequencer captures the steps during an installation to be pushed out on a larger scale.

episodes.title: SCOM Agent Configuration and Discovery
episodes.description: In this episode, Daniel and Adam show you how to deploy SCOM Agent configuration and discovery. They will demonstrate installation of the Operations Manager Agent on a computer as well as discover network devices in the Operations Manager.

episodes.title: Import Ops Manager Management Pack
episodes.description: In this episode, Daniel and Adam show you how to import an Operations Manager Management Pack from the catalogue. They quickly walk you through the steps of finding an Management Pack, downloading, and importing with the Ops Manager.

episodes.title: Linking VMM, SCOM and PRO
episodes.description: In this episode, Daniel and Adam show you how to connect the Virtual Machine Manager(VMM) with the Ops Manager and enable Performance and Resource Optimization(PRO). They also demonstrate configuring SQL Server Analysis Service for VMM.

episodes.title: Creating Private Cloud Building Blocks
episodes.description: In this show, Adam explains Private Cloud building blocks. First, he provides an overview of the Guest OS profile. Adam shows how to configure different settings such as Roles and Features, networking, and more. Hardware profiles are also reiterated through a demonstration.

episodes.title: Creating Private Cloud Building Blocks Part 2
episodes.description: In this show, Cherokee and Adam continue to discuss private cloud building blocks. First, Adam demonstrates how to use VMM to configure a SQL installation. They begin by suggesting use of the tool SysPrep to configure an image that con be used for multiple deployments. Adam demonstrates hoe to configure  VM and service templates to complete the SQL Server deployment.

episodes.title: Creating Private Cloud Building Blocks Part 3
episodes.description: In this show, Cherokee and Adam continue to discuss private cloud building blocks. Specifically, Adam explains what Service Provider Foundation is and demonstrates how to install and configure it. He explains what Management Stamps are and what they include.

episodes.title: Use APM to Monitor New Apps
episodes.description: In this show, Cherokee and Adam thumb-wrestle to determine who will demonstrate how to use Application Performance Monitoring (APM) to monitor new applications.

episodes.title: Configure Notification Accounts for Alerts
episodes.description: Watch Adam demonstrate how to create and configure notification accounts for receiving alerts.

episodes.title: Web Application Availability Monitoring
episodes.description: In this show, Adam explains step-by-step how to monitor web sites.

episodes.title: Viewing Distributed Application
episodes.description: In this show, watch Adam explain how to view distributed applications.

episodes.title: Configuring and Deploying Private Cloud
episodes.description: In this show, Adam and Cherokee begin discussing how to configure pooled resources and address the idea of limiting cloud capabilities such as processor range, memory range, Microsoft Synthetic Video Adapter, DVD Drive Range, Shared Image Mode, Bus Configuration, Network Adapters, Network Optimization and more!

episodes.title: Configuring and Deploying Private Cloud Part 2
episodes.description: In this show, Adam and Cherokee continue their previous conversation surrounding deploying and configuring access to a Private Cloud. They focus Service Templates, explaining how they define the elements that contain the service to be deployed to the private cloud.  Tune in tune in to see Adam demonstrate a Service Pack creation.

episodes.title: Configure Overrides
episodes.description: Cherokee and Adam break down a step-by-step demonstration to configure overrides. Tune in to learn how to use one of the many integrated overrides or create you own custom ones.

episodes.title: Synthetic Transaction Web Monitoring
episodes.description: In this show, Adam walks through the steps ho use synthetic transaction monitoring to monitor a web site URL.

episodes.title: Monitoring Cloud Infrastructure
episodes.description: In this show, Cherokee and Adam begin discussing different monitoring tools available for your cloud infrastructure. Adam Explains System Center Operations Manager (SCOM) and shows a layout describing SCOM components. Adam implores individuals to leverage tools such as Fabric Health dashboard/ diagram view, Team Foundation Server (TFS), web consoles, System Center Advisor, Unix/Linux monitoring and more!

episodes.title: Monitoring Cloud Infrastructure Part 2
episodes.description: In this show, Cherokee and Adam explain how to prepare an environment for System Center 2012 R2 Operations Manager. Adam covers many of the components such as Configuration Manager, Endpoint Protection and more. They also discuss several key features of SCOM including network monitoring, management pack templates and more. Tune in now to learn core SCOM components.

episodes.title: Monitoring Cloud Infrastructure Part 3
episodes.description: In this show, Cherokee and Adam continue to speak on ways SCOM can be utilized. They begin by examining Operations Manager and deployment options. Adam also introduces and demonstrates how management packs can be used and implemented.

episodes.title: Monitoring Cloud Infrastructure Part 4
episodes.description: In this show, Cherokee and Adam continue to examine SCOM capabilities. They begin looking at Object Discovery. They discuss the three methods one may implement them. Next, they look at Management Pack rules and associated concepts.

episodes.title: Monitoring Cloud Infrastructure Part 5
episodes.description: In this show, Cherokee and Adam continue to navigate through SCOM. Specifically, they look at Run As accounts, explain their functionality and demonstrate how to create one. They also discuss ovverides and how they can be used to override rules or monitors. They also cover how to discover and monitor different network devices as well as Faric Monitoring. Lastly, they explain how Data Protection Manager can integrate with SCOM.

episodes.title: Customize Monitoring of the Cloud
episodes.description: In this show, Cherokee and Adam show how to configure the System Center Management Pack for Windows Azure. Adam shares prerequisites to consider before planning an Azure integration as well as walking us through the process of what to do after importing the System Center Management Pack for Azure. Tune in now to learn the process of configuring integration between Operations Manager and System Center Advisor.

episodes.title: Customize Monitoring of the Cloud Part 2
episodes.description: In this show, Cherokee and Adam continue to explain how to customize monitoring. Adam covers guidelines for configuring several  Management Pack Templats such as the Process Monitoring Management Pack Template, TCP Port Monitor and more! They also explore additional ways to utilize SCOM such as Global Service Monitor and Real-Time Visio Dashboards.

episodes.title: Windows Azure Pack
episodes.description: In this episode Cherokee and Adam, discuss configuring self-service multi-tenant cloud infrastructure with Windows Azure Packs. They speak on topics such as registering VM clouds, navigating the end user and management portals, web site controllers, underlying APIs and more!

episodes.title: How to Deploy a Gateway Server
episodes.description: In this show, Cherokee and Adam explain how to deploy a gateway server. Adam covers pre-requisites one may consider prior to installation such as certificates required for PKI. He then walks us through the process even explaining how one can implement redundancies by adding additional gateway and management servers.

episodes.title: Install and Configure App Controller Server
episodes.description: In this episode, Daniel and Adam demonstrate how to install the SCOM App Controller. They start by looking at the prerequisites that are necessary for the installation. Then they take you step-by-step through the installation, explaining each of the options in detail.

episodes.title: Install Operations Manager on Single Server
episodes.description: In this episode, Daniel and Adam demonstrate how to install the Operations Manager on a single server. They start by looking at the prerequisites that are necessary for the installation. Then they take you step-by-step through the installation, explaining each of the options in detail.

episodes.title: Install Data Protection Manager
episodes.description: In this episode, Daniel and Adam demonstrate how to install the System Center Data Protection Manager. They start by looking at the prerequisites that are necessary for the installation. Then they take you step-by-step through the installation, explaining each of the options in detail.

episodes.title: Install Orchestrator on a Single Server
episodes.description: In this episode, Daniel and Adam demonstrate how to install the System Center Data Protection Manager. They start by looking at the prerequisites that are necessary for the installation. Then they take you step-by-step through the installation, explaining each of the options in detail.

episodes.title: Install Service Manager on a Single Server
episodes.description: In this episode, Daniel and Adam continue their demonstration of deploying a SCOM Management Group. Here they introduce you to the common deployment methods for the Agent, using the Console as well as PowerShell, or through manual installation. They also explore the Agent-less Exception Monitoring feature.

topics.title: Configuring and Deploying Private Cloud with VMM
Creating the Private Cloud Building Blocks
Deploying and Configuring Access to a Private Cloud
Extending and Customizing Monitoring of Cloud Infrastructure
Self-Service Multi-Tenant Cloud with Windows Azure Pack
Install and Configure System Center Components
